languages.text: "Что касается почтенного регента и его людей — считаю, они неповинны в грехах предателей. Однако повинны в их появлении здесь. Будет честно спросить с Дома Орселлио отступные за неосмотрительность".

traits.locale_text: "Что касается почтенного регента и его людей — считаю, они неповинны в грехах предателей. Однако повинны в их появленни здесь. Будет честно спросить с Дома Орселлио отступные за неосмотрительность".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."
languages.original_text: "Что касается почтенного регента и его людей — считаю, они неповинны в грехах предателей. Однако повинны в их появлении здесь. Будет честно спросить с Дома Орселлио отступные за неосмотрительность".

traits.locale_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' sins. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for a compensation for this improvidence."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' sins. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for a compensation for this improvidence."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' sins. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' sins. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “至于尊敬的摄政王与他的人民——我认为他们并没有犯下叛国罪，但把那些叛徒带到这里的人是他们，他们需要为此负责。因此，要求奥赛罗家族对这一过失进行赔偿，是公平的做法。”
languages.original_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."

traits.locale_text: “至于尊敬的摄政王与他的人民——我认为他们并没有犯下叛国罪，但把那些叛徒带到这里的人是他们，他们需要为此负责。因此，要求奥塞罗家族对这一过失进行赔偿，是公平的做法。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «En cuanto al estimado regente y su gente... no creo que sean culpables de los crímenes de los traidores. Sin embargo, sí son culpables de haber traído a los traidores, y por lo tanto sería justo exigir compensación a la casa Orsellio por su negligencia».
languages.original_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto al estimado regente y su gente... no creo que sean culpables de los pecados de los traidores. Sin embargo, sí son culpables de haber traído a los traidores, y por lo tanto sería justo exigir compensación a la casa Orsellio por su negligencia».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「尊敬する摂政とその部下については…不法行為を犯しているとは思いません。しかし、裏切り者たちをここに連れてきた責任は彼らにあります。ですから、オーセリオ家にこの過失に対する補償を求めるのは当然でしょう」
languages.original_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬する摂政とその部下については…不法行為を犯しているとは思いません。しかし、裏切り者たちをここに連れてきた責任は彼らにあります。ですから、オーセリオ家にこの過失に対する補償を求めるのは当然でしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Und was den geschätzten Regenten und sein Gefolge angeht – ich denke nicht, dass sie sich der Vergehen der Verräter schuldig gemacht haben. Aber sie haben sie hierher gebracht, und deshalb sollte das Haus Orsellio für diese Nachlässigkeit Wiedergutmachung leisten."
languages.original_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."

traits.locale_text: "Und was den geschätzten Regenten und sein Gefolge angeht – ich denke nicht, dass sie sich der Sünden der Verräter schuldig gemacht haben. Aber sie haben sie hierher gebracht, und deshalb sollte das Haus Orsellio für diese Nachlässigkeit Wiedergutmachung leisten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Quant à notre vénérable régent et sa suite, je ne les crois pas de connivence avec les traîtres, mais ils sont néanmoins coupables de les avoir amenés ici, et il ne serait que justice que la maison Orsellio offre une compensation pour cette terrible négligence. »
languages.original_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à notre vénérable régent et sa suite, je ne les crois pas de connivence avec les traîtres, mais ils sont néanmoins coupables de les avoir amenés ici, et il ne serait que justice que la maison Orsellio offre une compensation pour cette terrible négligence. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Değerli naibe ve yanındakilere gelelim. Hainlerin saldırısından mesul olduklarını düşünmüyorum. Asıl olarak onları buraya getirmekten sorumlular. Dolayısıyla Orsellio Hanesi'nden bu ihmalin karşılığını beklemek yanlış olmaz."
languages.original_text: "As for the esteemed regent and his people — I do not think they are guilty of the traitors' trespasses. But they are responsible for bringing them here, and therefore it would be fair to ask House Orsellio for compensation for this negligence."

traits.locale_text: "Değerli naibe ve diğerlerine gelirsek, hainlerin saldırısından dolayı suçlu olduklarını düşünmüyorum ama onları buraya getirmekten sorumlular ve dolayısıyla Orsellio Hanesi'nden bu ihmali nedeniyle bir karşılık beklemek yanlış olmaz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
